QuestData.Title: Blood Troll on the Outside
QuestData.Description:
One of our scouts, Jo'chunga, has infiltrated de blood trolls, but we have not heard back from him.
I need your help to find Jo'chunga and see what he has discovered about de blood trolls.
If you are going to find him, you need to sneak in by looking like one of de blood troll women. Dey are de ones with de most freedom to move around. I have a ritual that can change you.
Help me set up de ritual to make you look like a blood troll.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Witch Doctor Kejabu complete his ritual to disguise yourself as a blood troll.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Witch Doctor Kejabu to complete the ritual
